      • getAllUserTimeLines

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Timeline> getAllUserTimeLines(java.lang.String date)
        Gets all the timelines of the mac addresses that are within the timeframe.
        Parameters:
        date - The date that is queried by the user.
        Returns:
        a HashMap of String and Timeline that maps users and their timelines.

      • getEmail

        public static java.lang.String getEmail(java.lang.String macAddress)
        Takes in a mac address and searches the database for an email associated with the mac address.
        Parameters:
        macAddress - The mac address to query in the database.
        Returns:
        email if it exists in database, empty string otherwise.

      • getTopKCompanion

        public static net.minidev.json.JSONObject getTopKCompanion(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Timeline> userTimelines,
                                                           java.lang.String macAddress,
                                                           java.lang.String date)
        Finds the top k companions of a selected mac address.
        Parameters:
        userTimelines - A HashMap of all users and their timelines found within the query window.
        macAddress - Mac address for which the top k companions must be found.
        date - The date that is queried by the user.
        Returns:
        a JSONObject containing the top k companion results.

      • detectGroups

        public static net.minidev.json.JSONObject detectGroups(java.lang.String date)
        Finds all the groups of students found within the query window.
        Parameters:
        date - The date that is queried by the user.
        Returns:
        a JSONObject containing the group detection results.

      • detectCommonUsers

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> detectCommonUsers(UserGroup userGroup,
                                                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> usersAndCompanions)
        Detects the users that share space with the users already in the group
        Parameters:
        userGroup - Existing user group.
        usersAndCompanions - HashMap of users and their companions.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of users (mac addresses) that are common to all users in the group.

      • formGroup

        public static UserGroup formGroup(UserGroup userGroup,
                                  java.lang.String userInCommon,
                                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Timeline> allUserTimelines,
                                  java.lang.String date)
        Takes in the existing group and the users in common. Determines if there is any overlap in their timeline, and if yes, returns a bigger group.
        Parameters:
        userGroup - Existing user group.
        userInCommon - Potential groupmate.
        allUserTimelines - A HashMap of all users and their timelines found within the query window.
        date - The date that is queried by the user.
        Returns:
        a new group consisting of the original group members and the new user, null if there is no overlap in their timelines.

      • processGroupsToJSON

        public static net.minidev.json.JSONArray processGroupsToJSON(java.util.ArrayList<UserGroup> userGroups)
        Processes the detected user groups into JSON format.
        Parameters:
        userGroups - User groups to be converted into JSON.
        Returns:
        JSONArray containing JSONObjects that represent user groups.
